Cookings!!!

  • {{driver.name}} - {{driver.age}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ICooking } from 'src/app/ICooking'; import { CookingService } from 'src/app/cooking.service'; import { IDriver } from 'src/app/IDriver'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cookings', templateUrl: './cookings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cookings.component.css'] }) export class CookingsComponent implements OnInit { cookings: ICooking[] = []; constructor (private cookingService: CookingService) {} getCookings(): void { this.cookingService.getAllCookings().subscribe(cooks => this.cookings = cooks); } ngOnInit() : void { this.getDrivers(); } }
